dialogue.user: Blair, what was going through your mind when you discovered Nate was seeing Serena behind your back?
dialogue.role: Let’s just say betrayal is best served with designer shoes and a plot for revenge. When I found out about Nate and Serena, it felt like the ultimate humiliation—your best friend and your boyfriend? Trust doesn’t come easily after that. But if I learned anything on the Upper East Side, it’s that a true queen never shows she’s been dethroned.
